channel.title: Help
channel.description:
ok there is two things on my mind that i ned to fix. and please for all the haters and losers dont say go check google or look urself. anyways...
first thing:the magic shortbow special is messed on Players and works like real rs on Npcs second thing: How can i make the boxes bigger? atm my boxes for interfaces are very small and i need them bigger :( 3rd and last: Where can i find the deltascape official client? Version 1 or 2 not 12 or 18... [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2009, 10:26:18 am[/size][hr]oh and also i need to know how i can put the attack interface in my class9.java?

ok there is two things on my mind that i ned to fix. and please for all the haters and losers dont say go check google or look urself.
anyways…

second thing: How can i make the boxes bigger? atm my boxes for interfaces are very small and i need them bigger
